  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EventHubClientException
    Class for dealing with exceptions within the Event Hub SDK Also contains subclasses for more specific exceptions
    EventHubClientException.AddMessageException
    EventHubClientException for when the user adds more message than stated in the event hub configuration
    EventHubClientException.AuthenticationException
    EventHubClientException for when thrown when the user input (id, secret or scopes) is not correct
    EventHubClientException.AuthTokenRequestException
    EventHubClientException for when when the OAuth instance does not response as expected (bad json, no response, etc)
    EventHubClientException.IncorrectConfiguration
    EventHubClientException for when an action is preformed that the configuration did not support
    EventHubClientException.InvalidConfigurationException
    EventHubClientException called when the the configuration has invalid entries
    EventHubClientException.PublishFailureException
    EventHubClientException for when publish fails for whatever reason
    EventHubClientException.ReconnectFailedException
    EventHubClientException called when the client fails to reconnect
    EventHubClientException.SubscribeCallbackException
    EventHubClientException for when an incorrect callback was supplied to the client
    EventHubClientException.SubscribeFailureException
    EventHubClientException for when subscriber gets an error
    EventHubClientException.SyncPublisherFlushException
    EventHubClientException for propagating errors to the user during a flush() contains a list of throwables that contains th exceptions that have been thrown in the background
    EventHubClientException.SyncPublisherTimeoutException
